verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Shout for joy to God in all the earth
Shout for joy to God and sing His glory
Say unto the Lord, "How awesome are Your deeds!"
Say unto the Lord, "Great is Your power!"

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All the earth will bow before You
All the earth will sing your praise
All Your enemies bow down
All the earth will declare your praise.
